mapper.select:
select
from oms_order
create_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND create_time < CURDATE()

select COUNT(*) from oms_order
create_time >= CURDATE() AND create_time < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)

select
from oms_order
delivery_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND delivery_time < CURDATE()
AND status = #{status}

select
from oms_order
delivery_time >= CURDATE() AND delivery_time < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND status = #{status}

select oo.*, ooi.id OrderItemId, ooi.product_pic OrderItemProductPic, ooi.product_name OrderItemProductName, ooi.product_sn OrderItemProductSn, ooi.product_quantity OrderItemProductQuantity, ooi.product_attr OrderItemProductAttr, ooi.product_price OrderItemProductPrice from oms_order oo left join oms_order_item ooi ON oo.order_sn = ooi.order_sn where oo.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update oms_order
order_sn = #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
member_username = #{memberUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pay_amount = #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

coupon_amount = #{couponAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

`status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delivery_company = #{deliveryCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delivery_sn = #{deliverySn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receiver_name = #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
receive_time = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update oms_order set order_sn = #{orderSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, member_username = #{memberUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_amount = #{payAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, freight_amount = #{freightAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, coupon_amount = #{couponAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, source_type = #{sourceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delivery_company = #{deliveryCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_sn = #{deliverySn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_name = #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_phone = #{receiverPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_post_code = #{receiverPostCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_province = #{receiverProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_city = #{receiverCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_region = #{receiverRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_detail_address = #{receiverDetailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_time = #{paymentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, receive_time = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
